Alerts.AlertName: High CPU Usage

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - High CPU Usage
SavedSearch.Query:
let _maxValue = 85; let _timeWindow = 4h; let _AvgCpu = Perf | where TimeGenerated >= ago(_timeWindow) | where CounterName == "% Processor Time"      and InstanceName =~ "_Total"  | summarize mtgPerf=max(TimeGenerated), CounterValue=round(avg(CounterValue)), SampleCount=count(CounterValue) by Computer, InstanceName, CounterName, ObjectName; _AvgCpu | where CounterValue > _maxValue | project      Computer     , ObjectName     , CounterName     , InstanceName     , TimeGenerated=mtgPerf     , CounterValue     , AlertType_s = "Sustained High CPU Utilization"     , Severity = 4     , SeverityName_s = "WARNING"     , AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/CPUPercent/", InstanceName)     , AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": Sustained High CPU Utilization")     , AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "
Average CPU Utilization: ", CounterValue, "%
Sample Period: Last ", _timeWindow, "
Sample Count: ", SampleCount, "
Alert Threshold: > ", _maxValue, "%")

AlertDefinition.Name: High CPU Usage
AlertDefinition.Description: Triggers an alert for a high CPU usage condition

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - High CPU Usage

Alerts.AlertName: Low Disk Space Windows - Critical

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - Low Disk Space Windows
SavedSearch.Query:
let _minValue = 10; Perf | where TimeGenerated >= ago(1h) | where CounterValue <= _minValue | where CounterName == "% Free Space" and InstanceName in ("C:", "E:", "F:", "G:")  | summarize mtgPerf=max(TimeGenerated), CounterValue=max(CounterValue) by Computer, InstanceName, CounterName, ObjectName, DriveLetter=replace(@"(\w).",@"\1", InstanceName) | join kind=inner (     Heartbeat      | where OSType == "Windows"     | summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer     ) on Computer  | project      Computer     , ObjectName     , CounterName     , InstanceName     , TimeGenerated=mtgPerf     , round(CounterValue)     , DriveLetter     , AlertType_s = "Windows Low Disk Space"     , Severity = 3     , SeverityName_s = "WARNING"     , AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/", DriveLetter)     , AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": Low Disk Space on Drive ", DriveLetter)     , AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "
Drive Letter: ", DriveLetter, "
Percent Free Space: ", round(CounterValue), "%
Alert Threshold: <= ", _minValue, "%")

AlertDefinition.Name: Low Disk Space Windows
AlertDefinition.Description: Triggers an alert for a low disk space condition

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - Low Disk Space Windows

Alerts.AlertName: Low Memory

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - Low Memory
SavedSearch.Query:
let _minAvailableMB = 1024;
let _sampleInterval = 4h;
let _linuxMem = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(_sampleInterval)
| where CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory"
| summarize mtgPerf=max(TimeGenerated), CounterValue=avg(CounterValue), SampleCount=count(CounterValue) by Computer
| join kind=inner
(
    Heartbeat
    | where OSType == "Linux"
    | summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
)
on Computer
| project Computer, mtgPerf, AvailableMBytes=round(CounterValue), SampleCount;
let _windowsMem = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(_sampleInterval)
| where CounterName == "Available MBytes"
//and ObjectName == "Logical Disk"

//and InstanceName matches regex "/.*"
| summarize mtgPerf=max(TimeGenerated), CounterValue=avg(CounterValue), SampleCount=count(CounterValue) by Computer
| join kind=inner
(
    Heartbeat
    | where OSType == "Windows"
    | summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
)
on Computer
| project Computer, mtgPerf, AvailableMBytes=round(CounterValue), SampleCount;
_linuxMem
| union _windowsMem
| where AvailableMBytes < _minAvailableMB
| project       Computer      , TimeGenerated=mtgPerf      , CounterValue=AvailableMBytes       , AlertType_s = "Low Available Memory"      , Severity = 4      , SeverityName_s = "WARNING"      , AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/FreeMemoryMB/")      , AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": Low Available Memory")      , AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nAverage Free Memory: ", AvailableMBytes, " MB\r\nSample Period: Last ", _sampleInterval, "\r\nSample Count: ", SampleCount, "\r\nAlert Threshold: < ", _minAvailableMB, " MB")

AlertDefinition.Name: Low Memory
AlertDefinition.Description: Triggers an alert for a low memory condition

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - Low Memory

Alerts.AlertName: HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded
SavedSearch.Query: Event | where EventID == 1150 or EventID == 1151 | where RenderedDescription contains "CPQRACK.MIB" | project Computer, TimeGenerated, AlertType_s = "HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded", Severity = 4, SeverityName_s = "WARNING", AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/EventId-", EventID), AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded with Event ID", EventID), AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nEvent ID: ", EventID, "\r\nRenderedDescription: ", RenderedDescription)

AlertDefinition.Name: HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded
AlertDefinition.Description: Rack fans have failed.

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Rack Enclosure Fan Failed or Degraded

Alerts.AlertName: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded
SavedSearch.Query: Event | where EventID == 1202 or EventID == 1203 or EventID == 1216 | where RenderedDescription  contains "CPQIDA.MIB" | project Computer, TimeGenerated, AlertType_s = "HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded", Severity = 4, SeverityName_s = "WARNING", AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/EventId-", EventID), AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded with Event ID ", EventID), AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nEvent ID: ", EventID, "\r\nRenderedDescription: ", RenderedDescription)

AlertDefinition.Name: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded
AlertDefinition.Description: The drive array physical drive has degraded.

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Physical Drive degraded

Alerts.AlertName: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild
SavedSearch.Query: Event | where EventLog == "System" | where EventID == 1200 | where Source == "Storage Agents" | where RenderedDescription contains "new status of 6" and RenderedDescription contains "CPQIDA.MIB" | project Computer, TimeGenerated, AlertType_s = "HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild", Severity = 4, SeverityName_s = "WARNING", AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/EventId-", EventID, "/readyForRebuild"), AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild"), AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nEvent ID: ", EventID, "\r\nRenderedDescription: ", RenderedDescription)

AlertDefinition.Name: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild
AlertDefinition.Description: The drive array logical drive status has changed to 'readyForRebuild'

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert- HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is readyForRebuild

Alerts.AlertName: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed
SavedSearch.Query: Event | where EventLog == "System" | where EventID == 1200 | where Source == "Storage Agents" | where RenderedDescription contains "new status of 3" and RenderedDescription contains "CPQIDA.MIB" | project Computer, TimeGenerated, AlertType_s = "HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed", Severity = 4, SeverityName_s = "WARNING", AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/EventId-", EventID, "/failed"), AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed"), AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nEvent ID: ", EventID, "\r\nRenderedDescription: ", RenderedDescription)

AlertDefinition.Name: HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed
AlertDefinition.Description: The drive array logical drive status has changed to 'failed'

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Drive Array Logical Drive Status is failed

Alerts.AlertName: HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded

SavedSearch.DisplayName: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded
SavedSearch.Query: Event | where EventLog == "System" | where Source == "Server Agents" | where EventID == 1025 or EventID == 1026 or EventID == 1027 or EventID == 1028 or EventID == 1031 or EventID == 1071 or EventID == 1035 or EventID == 1039 | where RenderedDescription  contains "CPQHLTH.MIB" | project Computer, TimeGenerated, AlertType_s = "HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded", Severity = 4, SeverityName_s = "WARNING", AffectedCI_s = strcat(Computer, "/EventId-", EventID), AlertTitle_s = strcat(Computer, ": HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded with Event ID ", EventID), AlertDetails_s = strcat("Computer: ", Computer, "\r\nEvent ID: ", EventID, "\r\nRenderedDescription: ", RenderedDescription)

AlertDefinition.Name: HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded
AlertDefinition.Description: Memory degraded. Advanced Memory Protection has detected a memory fault.

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: Alert - HP Windows (SNMP) Memory degraded
